title: Loading Screen Error
body: For the last 2 months, almost every game I try to load in and it crashes. I get to the black screen and cannot load in. I have completely reinstalled the game, I have downloaded the repair tool, and nothing will work. Can someone please help me? I have accumulated so many leaver busters for something I cannot fix and it is ruining the game.

replies.body:
First, I recommend testing any of the following changes in a custom match to prevent incurring any further penalties. Most of these black screen issues are caused by an *unstable connection* to the servers, so this is likely caused by incompatible network settings on your local network. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address these possibilities.

Let me know if you still have issues connecting to those custom matches after taking those steps.
